description:
Pei Xian, who looks like the white moonlight (unattainable love) of the Villain, was going to be gifted to the Villain by his lover, Zhou Kai. Unable to withstand the betrayal by Zhou Kai, Pei Xian threatened to jump from the window of a 20 story building.

Si Yang, who died in the hospital full of wishes for a simple life, transmigrated into the body of Pei Xian. Pei Xian is a character in the 3rd rate novel he read above. He transmigrated at the scene where Pei Xian in the novel was about to jump from the window.

Gu Han, the “villain” in the novel somehow gained a system after his tragic end, returned to the same scene in the novel. The system helps him combat the protagonist’s halo of making the “villains” like him lose their IQ. Pei Xian is chosen as the system’s “battery”, so in order to charge the system, Gu Han must maintain physical contact with Pei Xian. Gu Han has no choice but to try and stop “Pei Xian” from killing himself.

So begins the story of a reluctant ML, pampering the MC.>
